title: How many Beatles songs did each composer write? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a total of 218 songs across 13  albums recorded by The Beatles There are 7 categories to songs by The Beates - 1. Written by Lennon2. Written by McCartney3. Written by Lennon and assisted by McCartney4. Written by McCartney and assisted by Lennon 5. Written by Lennon and McCartney (equal share) 6. Written by Harrison 7. Others (Starr, McCartney-Harrison, Lennon-Harrison and covers) Category 1 - Lennon wrote 66 songs on his own. The most prominent ones were - Strawberry Fields Forever, Across The Universe, Lucy In The Sky etc. My personal favourite is Nowhere Man (and Yer Blues too) Category 2 - McCartney replied with 60 songs of his own. The most prominent ones are All My Loving, Hey Jude, Let It Be, Yesterday etc. My personal favourite is Penny Lane Category 3 - 11 songs come under this category. The most famous ones are Day Tripper and In My Life. The latter is my favourite of this type Category 4 - 11 songs come under this category as well. The most famous ones are Yellow Sub (sung by Starr), I Saw Her Standing There, Michelle, Elanor Rigby. My personal favourite is Drive My Car (mainly because Harrison (!) plays bass) Category 5 - 10 songs come under this category. Prominent ones are A Day In The Life , I Wanna Hold Your Hand. My personal favourite is the one that they wrote for Starr - With A Little Help From My Friends Category 6 - 27 songs were written by Harrison alone. The best ones are I Me Mine, Within You Without You, Something (mainly philosophical songs). I love the song While My Guitar Gently Weeps , which I feel is the signature of Harrison Category 7 - 43 songs come under the others category . Starr wrote 3 songs - Dont Pass Me By, Octopus' Garden, Trip To Carolina . Covers include Long Tall Sally, Twist And Shout (yes it is a cover!!) , Please Mr Postman, Roll Over Beethoven etc. My favourite is Rock And Roll Music (cover of Chuck Berry's work)
